about_the_game:
Dive into an extraordinary adventure with Naturpark Lillebælt's immersive VR game, where the ocean's wonders come to life! Explore the beauty of Denmark's Lillebælt as you embark on a thrilling journey through diverse marine biotopes, blending fun, education, and sustainability into one unforgettable experience.

Embark on a series of captivating missions in Lillebælt's restoration and conservation efforts. Plant new eelgrass and witness the return of marine life to the area. Become a marine photographer, capturing elusive species living within the Stone Reef. Clean up trash from the seabed. Use a robotic arm to capture fish species. Don a diving suit to harvest clamps in the Ocean Gardens.

This VR game serves an educational purpose, created in collaboration with Naturpark Lillebælt to spread knowledge about the region's biodiversity and sustainability. By providing an interactive encounter with Lillebælt's marine life, players gain a profound understanding of the importance of conservation and their role in preserving this precious ecosystem.

Don your virtual snorkel and dive into an unparalleled adventure that seamlessly blends education and entertainment. Experience the thrill of VR as you become an ocean steward, contributing to the restoration of Lillebælt's rich biodiversity. Naturpark Lillebælt's VR game is your ticket to an awe-inspiring journey, connecting you with the magic and marvels of the ocean like never before.

name: Naturpark Lillebælt VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 1, Meta Quest 2 , Meta Rift S
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 1, Meta Quest 2 , Meta Rift S

short_description: Dive into VR missions at Naturpark Lillebælt. Plant eelgrass, catch fish, clean trash, and learn about biodiversity. Restore the ocean's balance in this educational adventure!
